COULD_YOU_REPEAT_THE_ORIGINAL_REQUEST.message: Můžete mi znovu zopakovat váš požadavek?

DENY_0.message: I'm sorry, but I don't think I could trust you with my safety.

DENY_1.message: Come back when you have some qualifications.

DENY_2.message: I don't think you're the pilot I'm looking for.

DENY_3.message: You don't look like someone capable of transporting people.

DENY_4.message: You're not the kind of pilot I'm looking for.

DENY_5.message: You seem much too inexperienced to handle a transport of this importance.

DENY_6.message: I have never heard of you. I need someone experienced for this journey.

DENY_7.message: I'm not willing to risk my life on someone without any qualifications like you.

FLAVOUR_0_ADTEXT.message: HLEDÁM: Místo na lodi pro malou skupinu do systému {system}. Zaplatím {cash}.

FLAVOUR_0_FAILUREMSG.message: Nepřijatelné! Trvalo to věčnost a den. Nedostaneš zaplaceno!

FLAVOUR_0_INTROTEXT.message: Ahoj, jsem {name} a potřebuju místo na lodi pro malou skupinu do systému {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}), vzdáleném {dist} ly. Zaplatím {cash}.

FLAVOUR_0_SUCCESSMSG.message: Děkujeme za hezký výlet. Dostaneš zaplaceno v plné výši.

FLAVOUR_0_WHEREAREWE.message: Kde to jsme? Už jsme se načekali dost - Vem nás do nejbližší stanice OKAMŽITĚ!

FLAVOUR_10_ADTEXT.message: HLEDÁM LOĎ: Odvoz na rychlé lodi do systému {system}.
